ExtensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name

ExtensionDescription.message: Allows configurable filtering/removal of deviations by user and/or keyword on DeviantArt.

BrowserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

FilterNameWithCount_Singular.description: A formatted string to display the name of a filter with the count of filters (singular)

FilterNameWithCount_Plural.description: A formatted string to display the name of a filter with the count of filters (plural)

FilterNameLoading.description: A formatted string to display when loading filters

ManageFilterText.description: The text displayed on links/buttons to manage a filter

ImportHeading.description: The heading displayed above the import section on the Import/Export view

ImportInstructions.message:
Drag & drop one or more DeviantArt Filter file(s) here
(or click anywhere in this box to select file(s) from your device)
ImportInstructions.description: The text displayed on the import drag-and-drop target box

InvalidImportFileTypeMessage.message: Error: That is not an accepted file format for import
InvalidImportFileTypeMessage.description: The message displayed when an invalid file format is detected during import

ExportHeading.description: The heading displayed above the export section on the Import/Export view

ExportHelpText.message: Use this to export all of your current filters to a file (for backup or migration purposes)
ExportHelpText.description: The help text displayed above the export section on the Import/Export view

ExportButtonLabel.description: The text for the button to export filters to a file.

DeleteAllFiltersButtonTooltip.description: The tooltip displayed on the button/icon to delete all filters for a specific filter type

ConfirmAllFiltersDeletePrompt.message: Are you sure you want to delete all $COUNT$ of your $NAME$ filters?
ConfirmAllFiltersDeletePrompt.description: The message displayed on the modal when asking for confirmation to delete all filters for a specific filter type

ConfirmAllFiltersDeleteTitle.description: The title displayed on the modal when asking for confirmation to delete all filters for a specific filter type

ConfirmFilterDeletePrompt.message: Are you sure you want to delete the "$VALUE$" $NAME$ filter?
ConfirmFilterDeletePrompt.description: The message displayed on the modal when asking for confirmation to delete a single filter

ConfirmFilterDeleteTitle.description: The title displayed on the modal when asking for confirmation to delete a single filter

ConfirmOptionsResetPrompt.message: Are you sure you want to reset all options to their default values?
ConfirmOptionsResetPrompt.description: The message displayed on the modal when asking for confirmation to reset options to defaults

ConfirmOptionsResetTitle.description: The title displayed on the modal when asking for confirmation to reset options to defaults

Options_EnabledPages_HelpText.message: Enable or disable filters on certain pages.

Options_PlaceholderFunctionality_HelpTex.message: Use these to control the behavior and appearance of the placeholder thumbnails that are shown for filtered deviations.

Options_PlaceholderFunctionality_OptionL.message: Prevent clicking on thumbnails for filtered deviations
Show the filter type/value on filtered deviations

Options_ShowUpdatedPage_HelpText.message: Use this to control if/when release notes are shown after the extension is updated.

Options_FilterUntaggedSubmissions_HelpTe.message: Control which types of submissions (if any) are automatically filtered when they do not have any tags

Options_FilterUntaggedSubmissions_Select.message: Do NOT automatically filter untagged submissions

Options_Change_PagesRequireReload.message: Open pages must be refreshed/reloaded for changes to take effect.

Warning_FilterName_Disabled.description: A formatted string that is displayed as a warning message when a type of filter is disabled

Notification_FilterCreatedForDisabledFil.message: The filter was created, but $NAME$ filters are currently disabled
Notification_FilterCreatedForDisabledFil.description: A formatted string that is displayed in a browser notification when a new filter is created for a type of filter that is currently disabled

Notification_FilterNotCreated_WithMessag.description: A formatted string that is displayed in a browser notification when a filter is not created (with the reason/message indicating why)

Filter_Keywords_UpsertHelpHTML.message:
• Keyword filters apply to tags and titles.
  • Keyword filters are not case sensitive.
  • Wildcard filters match the keyword and any words containing that keyword.

Filter_Keywords_PropInvalidPatternError_.message: Keywords should only contain letters, numbers, and underscores

Filter_Keywords_PropHint_Wildcard_True.message: Will match "$KEYWORD$" as well as any words containing "$KEYWORD$"
Filter_Keywords_PropHint_Wildcard_True.description: A formatted string that is displayed when hovering over the wildcard property of a wildcard filter to indicate how it works

Filter_Keywords_PropHint_Wildcard_False.message: Will only match the full word "$KEYWORD$"
Filter_Keywords_PropHint_Wildcard_False.description: A formatted string that is displayed when hovering over the wildcard property of a non-wildcard filter to indicate how it works

Filter_Users_PropInvalidPatternError_Use.message: Username must start with a letter and only contain letters, numbers, and hyphens

DarkModeSwitchLabel.description: The message displayed on the switch for toggling Dark Mode

RequiredFieldLabel.description: A formatted string that is displayed when a required field is not filled out

RequiredFieldEmptyError.description: A formatted error string indicating a required field is empty

InvalidFieldLabel.description: A formatted string that is displayed when a field's value is invalid

InvalidFieldLabelWithHint.description: A formatted string (with hint text) that is displayed when a field's value is invalid

FilterUpsertDialog_Title_Create.description: A formatted string to display as the title of the filter creation dialog

FilterUpsertDialog_Title_Update.description: A formatted string to display as the title of the filter update dialog

FilterDataGrid_EmptyStateHTML.message: You haven't created any filters yet. View the Usage Guide if you need help.
FilterDataGrid_EmptyStateHTML.description: A formatted string to display on the filter data grids when no valid filters exist. Should include a hyperlink with the $USAGE_GUIDE_URL$ placeholder for the below URL.

FilterDataGrid_ButtonLabel_CreateNew.description: A formatted string to display on the button to create a new filter

FilterDataGrid_MenuLabel_DeleteAll.description: A formatted string to display on the menu item to delete all filters

FilterDataGrid_MenuLabel_ExportAll.description: A formatted string to display on the menu item to export all filters

InvalidFilterData_Warning_Description_Li.message: The following filters are invalid, which likely prevents them from working as intended (or even at all). Because they are invalid, these filters cannot be displayed in, or managed by, the table below.
It is strongly recommended they be removed.

InvalidFilterData_Table_ReasonText_Missi.description: The formatted string to display in the invalid filters table for filters that do not have the ID property

InvalidFilterData_Table_ReasonText_Dupli.description: The formatted string to display in the invalid filters table for filters that have a duplicated ID property

PurgeInvalidFilters_Dialog_Description.message:
Are you sure you want to remove all of these invalid filters?
While recommended, this action cannot be undone.

TagFiltersMigratedNotificationMessage.message:
Your old tag filters have been converted to new keyword filters automatically.

Click this notification to view your keyword filters.

CreateFiltersFromDeviation_Username_Help.message: Toggle the switch to create a new user filter.

CreateFiltersFromDeviation_Tags_Help.message: Select one or more of the following tags to create new keyword filters.

CreateFiltersFromDeviation_Error_Fetchin.message: An error occurred while retrieving deviation metadata.

CreateFiltersFromDeviation_Error_Creatin.message: An error occurred while creating filters.

CreateFiltersFromDeviation_Error_Instruc.message: Please refresh the page and try again. If the problem persists, please report it.
Please refresh the page and try again. If the problem persists, please report it with the following information:

CreateKeywordFilterFromTag_ContextMenuLa.message: Create Keyword Filter for this Tag
